notes: This script assumes the user is working on a TACC cluster and some of the commands may need to be adapted for other clusters.
The script provides a comprehensive workflow for analyzing 2bRAD data, covering both de novo and reference-based approaches.
It includes detailed instructions for installing necessary software and configuring the environment.
The script offers various options for quality control, genotype calling, population structure analysis, and demographic inference.
It leverages a wide range of tools and resources available for genomics research, providing a valuable resource for researchers working with 2bRAD data.
